title: T-Minus 20 Days: A few pictures to tide you over on this day of Labor
body:
I hope everyone had a nice holiday vacation. Steve G., famed Moxie photog, has posted several new pictures of the progress at Moxie 2.0 -- check them out here! Despite having some sort of mental condition that causes him to be a Cubs fan, Steve takes some pretty nice pictures. Thanks again!

That's it for today's very special holiday post. Here's hoping we see some serious labor* at the new place over the next few weeks!

*If you're at least nine months pregnant, please stop by our new location over the coming weeks.
author: Dan
